text_logic_form: The triangle $PQS$ is congruent to the triangle $RQS$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $PQS$ is congruent to the triangle $RQS$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $QP$ is $2x$ units.
The length of the line $QR$ is $3y+8$ units.
The length of the line $SR$ is $2y$ units.
The length of the line $SP$ is $x$ units.
Point $S$ lies on the line segment $RP$.
The line $QS$ is perpendicular to the line $SR$.
line_instances: There are lines $PQ$, $QR$, $RS$, forming a triangle $QRS$.
There are lines $PQ$, $QS$, $SP$, forming a triangle $PQS$.
